translations: 使坚固；使硬化（indurate 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: This article explores indurated uterine mass form theory and clinic of t.
sentences.translation: 本文对石瘕症从理论与临床进行了探讨。

sentences.sentence: There are different working cases between two mated parts of jar. If the upper part has been indurated the life of jar would prolong.
sentences.translation: 针对缸套上、下两部分不同的工况条件，增加上部硬化轨迹的密度，使上、下两部分达到等同的耐磨性，大幅度提高了气缸套的耐磨性和使用寿命。

sentences.sentence: On examination the tumor may have the following characteristics: painless nodule, shiny and waxy, indurated, firm and immobile, pearly, rolled border, and small telangiectatic vessels.
sentences.translation: 检查时可发现该肿瘤有如下特征：无痛性结节，表面光亮呈蜡样，质硬不活动，有珍珠般光泽，边缘卷曲且有小的扩张血管。
